amendment.description: To amend provisions of law originally enacted in the Clinger-Cohen Act to enhance agency planning for information security needs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3727 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3727 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S9913; text: CR S9913) To amend provisions of law originally enacted in the Clinger-Cohen Act to enhance agency planning for information security needs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3727 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3727 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cornyn.
